summary: Refactor the native Rust bridge value extraction code by replacing a repetitive 3-line pattern with a reusable macro to improve code cleanliness and maintainability.
userImpact: No direct user impact; improves developer experience by reducing code duplication in the native bridge implementation.
proposedFix: Replace the 3-line repetitive value extraction pattern with a Rust macro that abstracts the get, downcast, and value operations.
resolutionDetails: The enhancement was implemented to clean up the native bridge code using a macro pattern.
keyQuote: Replace it with this... macro_rules! js_value!... Then you can just say js_value!(server_options, cx, "namespace", JsString)
